Actions.Name: Chariot
Actions.Exceed: Foe is knocked into the air, removing them, then placing them in any space in range 3.
Actions.PostEffects: The [name] dashes up to 2 spaces before and after this attack. This attack deals added base damage on hit or miss based on how far the [name] moved with this ability before making the attack.

Combo.Name: Spin Out
Combo.Effects: Deal 3 damage to all foes in range 2. The [name] gains evasion until the start of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Throw Knife
Actions.Description: A foe in range takes damage equal to the range from the [name].

Actions.Name: Rev
Actions.Description: The [name] gains stealth, then increases its speed and the distance moved by Chariot by 2 for the rest of combat.
